s.text: Oliver Wendell Holmes, stereoscope enthusiast, wrote of the experience that Òthe shutting out of surrounding objects, and the concentration of the whole attention, which is a consequence of this, produce a dreamlike exaltationÉin which we seem to leave the body behind us and sail away into one strange scene after another, like disembodied spiritsÓ (Holmes 1861).
Throughout his career Bela Julesz was able to add language after language to his research imperative, becoming a true scientific polyglot.
